Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.auth.jwt

Class JsonWebToken

java.lang.Object
gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.auth.jwt.JsonWebToken
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationToken
public class JsonWebToken extends Object implements AuthenticationToken
A JSON Web Token (RFC 7519).

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonWebToken

      public JsonWebToken(JwsAlgorithm signAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> payload, Key key)
      Construct a JWT using the signature algorithm, key, and payload.
      Parameters:
      signAlgorithm - The signature algorithm
      payload - The JWT payload
      key - The key to sign with (must be compatible with algorithm)

    • JsonWebToken

      public JsonWebToken(JwsAlgorithm signAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> header, Map<String,Object> payload, Key key)
      Construct a JWT using the signature algorithm, key, payload, and header.
      Parameters:
      signAlgorithm - The signature algorithm
      header - The JWT header
      payload - The JWT payload
      key - The key to sign with (must be compatible with algorithm)

      public String getKid()
      Returns the id of the key used to sign the JWT (per JSON Web Key spec).
      Returns:
      The key id, if present

    • getExpiration

      public long getExpiration()
      Returns the expiration time of the JWT.
      Returns:
      The expiration time in epoch seconds, if present

    • hasExpirationTime

      public boolean hasExpirationTime()
      Does this JWT have an expiration time?
      Returns:
      True if the JWT has an expiration time.

    • isExpired

      public boolean isExpired()
      Is this JWT expired?
      Returns:
      True if JWT is expired, false if still valid

    • getNbf

      public long getNbf()
      Returns the "not before" time of the JWT.
      Returns:
      The not before time in epoch seconds, if present

    • satisfiesNbf

      public boolean satisfiesNbf()
      Is this JWT allowed to be processed yet?
      Returns:
      True if JWT satisfies nbf restrictions, false if it doesn't

    • getIssuedAt

      public long getIssuedAt()
      Returns the time that this JWT was issued.
      Returns:
      The issued time in epoch millis
